to Use BitQuant

Automatic trading allows you to stop sitting the whole day in front of charts to find trading opportunities. It can work without checking as long as you may need

To be sure that the trading bot works properly we have real traders who have developed the platform. A constant control from them will help the system performs stable and make profit
